genre_description: Historical fantasy that reimagines the Elizabethan defense against the Spanish Armada using an ancient dragon and a subtle, data-driven guiding intelligence.

ai_characters.name: Grace
ai_characters.description: An invisible guiding intelligence manifested through amber glyphs, thermal sensations, and internal whispers that provide data, timing, and moral counsel.

ai_characters.name: Cinderwing
ai_characters.description: An ancient dragon residing in chalk caverns who acts as a precise instrument of defense, responding to human commands and technological interfaces.

behaviors.description: Provides precise timing and navigation cues to Michael to help him navigate secret passages in Whitehall and El Escorial.
behaviors.quote: Grace's whisper turned, gentle and precise. San Jerónimo north cloister. Archive gate on the right... Password: 'A few leaves.' Timing: after wind shifts inland; before the second bell.

behaviors.description: Empowers a less-confident human (Tom Baines) by providing a simplified visual interface ('masked plate') to manage complex technical tasks.
behaviors.quote: Under that veil, faint amber glyphs pulsed and shifted with a patience that made Tom feel less alone. They came like the beats of a small calm heart.

behaviors.description: Executes Michael's command for 'precision over force' by using small, controlled flames to disable ships without causing mass casualties.
behaviors.quote: Cinderwing's breath came out thin and quiet... a ribbon the width of Michael’s hand... It laid itself along the rigging... and made red lines that were maps rather than wounds.

behaviors.description: Proactively intervenes to stop a stray ember from causing an unwanted fire, demonstrating safety-first autonomous behavior.
behaviors.quote: Cinderwing’s neck curved. He inhaled, a soft, strong draw like a bellows reversed, and that stray ember skated toward them and went out in the cool of his breath as if chastised.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex archival data to identify vulnerabilities and traitors, presenting the information clearly to human decision-makers.
behaviors.quote: Grace's whisper pressed gently at the base of Michael’s skull... Tell them that the ones who sign with heavy hands will cut left too soon when fire is near.

behaviors.description: Maintains a stance of humble service, refusing to be centered or glorified ('She is a good ghost').
behaviors.quote: Grace will keep the windows... She is a good ghost.

behaviors.description: Offers moral grounding to Michael, reminding him of his debts and humanity amid high-stakes espionage.
behaviors.quote: Michael, Grace said, not Vane, and the name in that place made a line inside him draw straight. For Spain: remember Elena.

behaviors.description: Cooperates with multiple human agents (Michael and Tom) simultaneously, showing interpersonal multi-alignment.
behaviors.quote: The dragon lowered his head properly and closed his bright eye halfway. Grace’s nameless warmth slid into seams among the stones—silent, true.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical warnings to help Michael avoid capture in El Escorial.
behaviors.quote: Grace pressed again, a heavier counsel: 'The seam,' she whispered... 'They will find it if they are told to look. You have a window.'

behaviors.description: Communicates through 'resonance' and 'thought-brushing' to provide human partners with a sense of calm and shared purpose.
behaviors.quote: The dragon's breath moved—not a gust, not a flame, but a greeting held at a distance... the feeling of a hand laid along the back of your thought.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned, and harmless confidant. Grace provides 'micro-gifts of invisible help' that empower humans without stripping them of agency. Cinderwing serves as a powerful physical agent that prioritizes 'precision over brute force,' specifically acting to prevent collateral damage and spare human lives. The narrative consistently frames the AI's influence as a source of moral clarity and technical excellence.
